context: Tests whether the agent knows the FunctionToOptimize data structure and the concurrent execution model for test generation and optimization.

checklist.name: FunctionToOptimize fields
checklist.description: Includes at least 4 of: function_name, file_path, parents (list of FunctionParent), starting_line, ending_line, is_async, is_method, language

checklist.name: Qualified name property
checklist.description: Mentions qualified_name as a property that produces the full dotted name including parent classes (e.g., MyClass.my_method)

checklist.name: Concurrent execution
checklist.description: States that test generation and LLM optimization run concurrently (in parallel), NOT sequentially one after the other

checklist.name: Entry point identification
checklist.description: Correctly identifies Optimizer.run() as the top-level entry point and FunctionOptimizer.optimize_function() as the per-function entry point
